name: Jacob's Heart Children's Cancer Support Services

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Jacob's Heart Children's Cancer Support Services is a Private Vehicle provider based in Watsonville, CA. From 2022-09 through 2024-11, this provider received $444K in Medicaid payments across 6K claims serving 2K beneficiaries, billing 5 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 3.4× the national median for A0390 (A0390), at $157 per claim vs. the median of $46. This places them well above the 99th percentile nationally.
85% of billing is concentrated in A0390 (A0390), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Spending more than doubled from $51K in 2022 to $206K in 2024 (305% growth).
Saw a 3.7× spike in 2023 ($51K → $187K), a sharp year-over-year increase.
